certificates.name: Core Designer Certificate
certificates.description: Professional certification demonstrating expertise in designing and implementing end-to-end data science workflows using Dataiku's visual interface and automation capabilities.

certificates.name: ML Practitioner Certificate
certificates.description: Validates hands-on skills in building, training, and deploying machine learning models using Dataiku's platform for practical data science applications.

certificates.name: Python for Data Science
certificates.description: Foundational certification demonstrating the ability to write Python scripts and perform hands-on data analysis using IBM's Jupyter-based lab environment.

certificates.name: Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate
certificates.description: Demonstrates expertise in designing and implementing AI solutions using Azure Cognitive Services, Azure Machine Learning, and Knowledge Mining.

certificates.name: Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Scientist Associate
certificates.description: Validates skills in applying machine learning techniques to train, evaluate, and deploy models using Azure Machine Learning and MLflow.

certificates.name: Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Fundamentals
certificates.description: Foundational knowledge of machine learning and artificial intelligence concepts and related Microsoft Azure services.

certificates.name: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2024 Generative AI Certified Professional
certificates.description: Professional certification demonstrating proficiency in Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Generative AI services and implementation strategies.
